
b7v z1Timer.Friday = 06:00;22:00;-:-;-:-;-:-;-:-
  b7v z1Timer.Friday ('from.0=ShortTime(6, 0)', 'to.0=ShortTime(22, 0)', 'from.1=None', 'to.1=None', 'from.2=None', 'to.2=None')

b7v PrEnergySum = 2
  b7v PrEnergySum ("energy4='2kWh'",)

bai errorhistory = nosignal
  bai errorhistory ('index=NA', 'status=NA', 'time2=NA', 'date=NA', 'error=NA', '+date+time2=NA')
